post_title: FS T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off PSA 2
post_content:
For Sale T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off Piedmont 350-460 PSA 2. This Cobb has some of the best registration I have ever seen, beautiful color, and high end eye appeal. Wear to the corners and some creasing limited to the lower left and upper right corners account for the grade; A monster for this grade. The price below includes shipping. Please visit my website at the link below email [url]wiseguycards@gmail.com[/url], or shoot me a PM if you are interested or have any questions. 

•T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off PSA 2 $6500
